title: Murder at the University
description: A pretty French student is found dead in her room at an exclusive Oxford college. Everyone thinks it is another tragic case of accidental drug overdose.  But Detective Hillary Greene has a nose for the truth. She quickly discovers that the student was involved in some very unusual activities.  With a shocking cause of death found, the case becomes a high-profile murder investigation.  Adding to the pressure, Hillaryâ€™s nemesis is transferred to work with her at the station.  Can Hillary keep her cool and get justice for the unfortunate student?
author: Faith Martin
